website_summaries.verdict: Relieve sinus pressure and headaches quickly and conveniently with the comfortable ARRIS heated eye mask.
pros: Heat acts quickly to relieve built-up sinus pressure
Timer settings go up in 10 min
Mask is soft and lets in little to no outside light
The extra-long USB power cord and attached remote make the mask easy to use anywhere

customer_reviews.title: Took off 1 star because I had to modify it to supply moist heat
customer_reviews.text: The instructions say not to use if it is wet or damp. My dry-eye condition seems to benefit most from moist heat. This might sound a little crazy but I found a perfect work-around for this problem. I place a panty liner over the part that goes against your face and spritz that real good. The fabric remains completely dry, my eyes get the moist heat and the added padding seems to make better connection with my eyelids too. The head is more than adequate to heat up the panty liner on setting 5. Very pleased with this purchase it gets nice and hot.
customer_reviews.author: jaime

customer_reviews.title: This is better and cheaper than disposable heated eye masks!
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask was better than expected. The materials were soft and comfortable. Plenty of heat produced on a low setting of just 2 and the mask heated up fairly quickly. A timer can be set up to 30 minutes so no need to worry falling asleep with the mask on. The controls were easy to use, instructions are not needed. You will need a USB power source as a wall adapter is not provided. I used my phone charger and that worked perfectly. I wish the cord could plug into either side of the mask, but I guess this might be a little too picky. Overall I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Albert J Kim

customer_reviews.title: The mask doesn't touch your eyes
customer_reviews.text: The whole purpose of the heated eye mask for dry eyes is for the mask to rest against your eyes. This mask doesn't touch your eyes unless you press against it. If you set the timer for 30 minutes you have to press on the mask for 30 minutes which gets tiring.
customer_reviews.author: Christine ODell

customer_reviews.title: High quality. Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom as she has dry eyes from her chemo therapy. I of course made sure it was going to work when it arrived. ;);) My eyes are fine, but its great as i have trouble getting to sleep at night and this thing magically makes my eyes super exhausted after just a few minutes on low heat. Be careful as it dose get quite warm of high heat and it made my eyes hurt. Thats said its super comfy and soft and it dose block out the light. It would be great on a plane and fighting jet lag. Its also winter and it makes a great head warmer.
customer_reviews.author: FarmerBoyFPV

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE MICROWAVE, HIGH TECH is the way to ...
customer_reviews.text: NO MORE MICROWAVE, HIGH TECH is the way to go in treating Meibomain clogged glands.
customer_reviews.author: Gail A. Honadle

customer_reviews.title: If you work with computers...BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this little thing. I do feel relexed after using it. Similar products will only heat for 30 minutes. This one goes for one hour. I sometimes feel eyestrain after looking at data for hours. Have even taken it to work, and applied it during a short break in the wellness rooms to give my eyes a break. This is well worth the investment. I bought this for eyestrain and relaxation but I have to admit I'm starting to see the beauty enhancement. My puffiness has gone down a bit. Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lulani88

customer_reviews.title: Great for headache sufferers
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this little contraption! I get headaches, and tire of microwaving over and over again. Get comfortable, get up to microwave. Get comfortable, fall asleep, wake up and the thing is cold. Now, I wrap this on my head, turn it on and relax. It gets hot enough but doesn't burn. So pleased!!
customer_reviews.author: NYLynnie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly Surprised
customer_reviews.text: I did not initially know if this would help me relax and sleep better. It did as well as helped with the bags under my eyes, though that may have been the result of a better nights sleep. I spend a lot of time at the computer so my eyes are taxed day in and day out. I am pleasantly surprised. It also works well with a portable USB charger.
customer_reviews.author: Brian K Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this eye mask. The fabric is so soft and comfortable, and the adjustability of the straps guarantees a perfect fit. The heater works well, though I often find myself using the mask without turning that on. The fabric and my body heat do a good enough job providing warm relief. The mask blocks light, making napping during the day much easier. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Damon

customer_reviews.title: eye relief
customer_reviews.text: as a suffer of dry eyes and frequent eye infections /irritation, I am very happy with this little eye mask. The warmth it provides is very therapeutic and calming to the eyes. I love using it! I have seen a decrease in the eye irritation and infections since i combined it with my other eye regime. My only negative is that the mask does not fit as close to the eye as I would like but the heating element is good and I still feel the warmth. I had to get use to sleeping with the cord plug in.. I suggest a longer plug in with the next module.
customer_reviews.author: donna rae fisher

customer_reviews.title: Great for headaches
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised how soft and comfortable this product is. It heats up quickly and delivers the perfect amount of heat to help ease my headaches away. I can wear it multiple ways, depending on where my headache is, even on the back of my head. Today I used the mask to help relax me to sleep for an afternoon nap. Im glad I found this, no more heavy, akward to use microwave heat packs for me.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Rheaume

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product !
customer_reviews.text: I love this mask. I have meibomian dysfunction in my eye glands and my ophthalmologist wanted me to use warm eye packs heated by microwave. This does help me. I did not want to use microwave and was so happy to find this. My husband also has dry eye and he likes this mask also. I would love it to be just a tad warmer, but still, I am overall very pleased with it. It’s so relaxing too.
customer_reviews.author: Lillylangtree

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from migraines and have a tendency to put heating pads over my head to help with the pain. I love this eye mask. It is comfortable and easy to use. It doesn’t get hot at least not for me, but it’s still pretty warm. My only complaint is I wish it would get hotter. Other than that I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: juju

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: Not only does this have 5 different temperatures to choose from but it has a timer. This has helped with my dry eyes and I also fall asleep quicker. This was unexpected and an added plus for me. I set the heat on the highest temp for 20-60 minutes every evening. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SMcGreal

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be helping my 89 year old mother.
customer_reviews.text: Nice color. Comfortable. I like that the length of time and the Temperature control are adjustable. However, I bought this for my elderly mother and she has a hard time seeing it. Wish the control was bigger. The elastic that slips over the head is nice but I hope it won't stretch out over time. So far so good. We are hoping it will relieve the dry eye and MGD issues she has. I'm sure this is a treatment that will need to be consistent to see results. I also bought this in brown and the closure is different. This one has velcro to close and it isn't long enough to make closing comfortable or easy.
customer_reviews.author: Erline Norton

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: Pretty simple product, honestly. A soft eye mask with a tiny bit of padding, and an adjustable head strap with USB charger and thermometer. It warms up quickly, fits well on your forehead or over your eyes, and it feels fantastic. The brochure recommends setting 5 for 30 minutes (MAX time on this thing) and it's a perfect setting. It's especially great for my sinus issues, and for sinus pain, and is incredibly relaxing over my eyes without being jammed into them. I love the simplicity and design, and the fact it's soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: TINA

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a traditional 2nd year anniversary gift....had to be cotton something......anyway, my wife LOVES it... she uses it every night..... it's been a year and it still works, but however, the plug in for the cord is nearly worn out, so will probably have to buy another one soon...other than that, it's pretty cool. Works for dry eye syndrome, headaches, sinus pain, and doubles as a sleeping mask. 4 stars because of the durability.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me for frequent sinus migraines and TMJ pain. Wow, I wish I bought this sooner. The timer is great is so helpful, so you don’t accidentally fall asleep with the heat on your head, and it doesn’t get too hot. Just the right amount for some relief of the pain. Easy to sleep with on, adjustable strap too. So happy I purchased this, helps ease some of the pain. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ElleKat

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I have suffered from migraines for years and always used a microwaved corn-filled bean bag balanced over my eyes/sinuses to relieve the pain. It was difficult to keep in place and would never stay warm long enough. This heating pad wraps comfortably around my head so I can move around easily if desired without it falling off. The USB jack fits into a portable charger, so I don't need to lay right next to an outlet. The variable heat settings offer a nice selection of temperatures... I used the highest setting and it was just right. This item has been an awesome help in relieving my migraines. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Wolff

customer_reviews.title: Great for Treating Dry Eye (MGD)
customer_reviews.text: Took the advice of a previous purchaser and added a layer of moisture ( wet paper towel, pad, etc) and the heating mask works great! Plus, the added layer keeps the heating element from getting g too hot; I am able to use the “4” heat setting with no problem, and it provides the right temperature for treating the blocked oil glands that cause my extreme dry eye. No more hassle with trying to keep a wet wash cloth heated; Set the timer for 10-15 minutes and it’s perfect for a relaxing, comfortable dry eye treatment. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: CAN/Great PNW

customer_reviews.title: So far I'm pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item several days ago and can tell you that my dry eyes feels more relaxed. With allergy season upon me it also helps ease my headaches. I suspect that I have the beginnings of blepharitis and this mask seems to be helping with that also. So far I'm pleased with my purchase. The material so soft and the fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Terri Mauck

customer_reviews.title: Heats fast, easy to use and it works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Got this on Friday...sleepless nights mean bags and dark circles. Charged it up, put it on for 20 minutes and both were almost invisible!! Not only that but my allergies are horrible and it cleared up my nasal passages! I have used it everyday and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Beth B

customer_reviews.title: Comy but does not get warm enough
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this but, it really only gets warm at 5 the highest setting. It does not get warm enough to help with dry eyes. It is comfortable and soft and the USB connection is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Terry E

customer_reviews.title: Migraines? This is an absolute must have.
customer_reviews.text: I have issues where if I don't take care of a headache immediately, it balloons into a massive migraine. I've always resorted to having my boyfriend heat up hot rags to drape over my eyes until a friend told me there were electric masks. This one has been a godsend. My only issue I have is that it has to remain plugged in, but it's such a minor gripe considering how well it works I can't even bring myself to take any stars off for it. I use this even for just helping to fall asleep. I can't recommend this enough.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it! Love the timer feature because I put it on to help me fall asleep at night. If I have a ton of computer work to do I've used it during a break to help with eye tension/strain. The highest setting is actually decently hot, I've had issues in the past finding something that got past slightly warm. Wish it came in more colors!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley L

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sleep so far
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mask for the last 2 nights and it is very comfortable. It keeps out all light and the heat is extremely nice to fall asleep to. It seems like it is made of a soft high-quality material that will last a long time. The heat settings are 1-5 with 5 being the hottest. I have found that 2-3 is perfect for me. I recommend this heated mask to anyone that is looking for a product like this. It works great and comes with everything you need to get a great night sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Jared New

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working After A Few Months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on 5/7/2020. It's not something I used on a daily basis, but by September it had completely stopped heating. My only complaint besides that was the heating element seemed to be right above my eyes. I bought this for sinus pain and pressure, so I'd have to move the mask upwards a bit to feel the heat anywhere but directly over my eyeballs.
customer_reviews.author: BamaLady

customer_reviews.title: Love this - so relaxing!
customer_reviews.text: Dealing with chronic migraines means a lot of facial pain for me, especially around the eyes and in my temples. Unlike others, I can't use cold packs because of frostbite when I was young. I have a couple of items that I can use as heat packs, but they cool down too quickly. This mask is perfect! There are 5 temp settings and the timer can be set for up to 60 minutes, with automatic shut off. I'm usually asleep before it shuts off, it's so relaxing and at least temporarily relieves the pain. This was definitely worth the money for me!
customer_reviews.author: Paula Beckman

customer_reviews.title: Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This helps with headaches. Heats up insanely fast and auto shuts off after an hour. I love this! Worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra DeRose

customer_reviews.title: No more burning stinging dry eyes !
customer_reviews.text: Wow so much easier than trying to warm your eyes with a heating pad! I love my new heat mask and use it at night and in the morning. Temperatures are perfect it’s got a timer I couldn’t ask for more
customer_reviews.author: Toni Smith

customer_reviews.title: No need to look further
customer_reviews.text: The essential question you need to know the answer to is “does this eye mask do as I need?” There is no simpler answer than “yes.” The material is very soft and thus quite comfortable. It does not feel too harsh on your face, while the adjustable strap works great. The heating capabilities work great as well. Heats up fast and with a good temperature. Of course you can adjust to your liking and the added timer function is great for falling asleep. My wife loves it for her headaches, it helps wonders. My only wish is that the cord were a bit longer. Overall I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse C Mazzariello

customer_reviews.title: PhD student must-have- Headaches and Migraines!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for those of us with frequent headaches and migraines! Slide it up on to your forehead and you can still get some work done. Great for trying to fall asleep when you have a bad migraine too. I wish it was a little bit hotter- the microwave head pillows will pack more of a punch if you have time to mess with them.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: SO GLAD I GOT THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I am a migraine sufferer and this is so helpful whenever I have an attack. Can’t say anything bad about this little gem! The USB plug was such a g great idea. Would recommend to all migraine sufferers
customer_reviews.author: Livi's Nana

customer_reviews.title: Lukewarm At Best
customer_reviews.text: I have severe dry eyes and the microwavable Bruder masks help, but don't stay hot long enough. I wanted something that gave me a constant heat and saw that this mask advertises it goes up to 140F, which should be more than hot enough. The problem is the mask never even came close to that temperature. At max heat, the mask was only slightly warm to the touch. There is not anywhere near the amount of heat it would take to help with dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Mantis T. M.D

customer_reviews.title: This Arris heated eye mask is perfect for relaxation
customer_reviews.text: I love how this Arris heated eye mask wraps all the way around my eyes and covers my ears. I use this mask for insomnia and for falling asleep. Once i put on the heated eye mask, i dont want to take it off. The heat and comfort of the mask puts me in a state of bliss. I would recommend this to anyone, especialy if they have trouble sleeping.
customer_reviews.author: sharkraycr

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love for Sinus Pain
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I bought it for sinus pain and it is awesome! I love the long cord so I can wear it in bed and the softness of the mask. Also really glad there’s a timer and numerous temp settings. The only things I’d change would be that it comes with its own charging brick (it only has a cord) and I’d make it have more than 5 temp settings (I’m really sensitive to heat so there’s a big difference between 1 and 2, 2 and 3...). Overall extremely pleased with this purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: David Korte

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Well i have to say so far this is one of the best i have used. Basically its an eye mask, but i have terrible migrain and i used it for that, what a difference it make, and also has a timer setting, so no way ir can be over heated, this help so much with my migrain,
customer_reviews.author: Halnettige T Perera

customer_reviews.title: Works great for dry eyes and travel
customer_reviews.text: honestly for someone with dry eyes and mgd this is a life saver I have one for the microwave but this is perfect for travel and or when I’m too lazy to get up and microwave the other one I have tried others online and they were such a waste of money I’ve had it for a year and still works great using it quite often which is surprising it gets really hot , it does touch your eyelids if you position it correctly but my understanding is the infrared heat will penetrate your lids weather it’s touching or not , when I dies I will be buying another I hope they do not discontinue this product 🙌🏼
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for my Migraines
customer_reviews.text: As I suffer from migraines this has been a great investment steady heat. The timer I wish was longer but really not a big deal beats getting up & putting one in a microwave. I find the heat setting prefect I've been using level 5 mainly. I've plug it into outlet & a battery works great.
customer_reviews.author: Veteran's Wife

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and the 5 temperature control is great for ...
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable and the 5 temperature control is great for dry eye sufferers with MGD like myself. Plug it in, turn it on, set the temperature and timer, and you're set! So much better than alot of microwaved heating eye masks that don't hold the heat for as long as may be needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cee

customer_reviews.title: Lousy
customer_reviews.text: Didn't get hot, short cord. Broken already (2 months), used 5 times!
customer_reviews.author: DAS

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this mask over 6 months. It does the job. It reliefs the sore after watching screens for a long time. It also put me in sleep very fast, LOL. I like it a lot. The only part I don’t like is the cable connection part is loose. It drops if I move around wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great lil heater
customer_reviews.text: This thing is amazing. It heats up quickly and is very comfy on the face. Got it mainly for the wife and she says it's helping her to have "quiet time' away from the toddler..lol It has 5 settings total. The hottest is a little too much for me but the first 2 are where I run it at. Wo
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: This product does nothing for chalazions
customer_reviews.text: This product does nothing for chalazions, so if you’re buying for this reason then look elsewhere cause this isn’t a cure at all
customer_reviews.author: micka

customer_reviews.title: great idea but not good enough design
customer_reviews.text: review update: I was contacted by the seller and a full refund was made, they were very nice and professional I love the idea but sadly doesn't heat enough like a gel mask even with the highest setting of 5 and it doesn't touch my eyelids I have to keep pressing it to reach my eyes but the material is good and soft
customer_reviews.author: Telmetwally

customer_reviews.title: Helps relieve my migraines
customer_reviews.text: This eye mask has become a staple for when I'm dealing with a migraine. I keep it right next to my bed so I can use it whenever needed. I highly recommend it to anyone who experiences pain around their eyes when having a migraine.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice heated eye mask for the money
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my mom who suffers from macular degeneration and dry eye. She finds it very soothing and easy to use. She is 92 and has difficulty seeing, but she does just fine with the controls. You can change the temperature and timer very easily. We leave it plugged into the USB in her recliner which makes it very convenient for her to use. I would highly recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Henters

customer_reviews.title: So soft, warm..
customer_reviews.text: This one is super nice it is the second heated mask I have ordered. All I am gonna say is I shoulda spent the extra buck and gone with this one to begin with. P.s supppppeeerrr soft <3
customer_reviews.author: Mercy

customer_reviews.title: Not enough heat, especially for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: Even at the highest temperature setting it barely emits enough heat, I originally thought the one I got was defective and requested a replacement, but it’s still the same. Just not hot enough especially if you have dry eye.
customer_reviews.author: RSSS1

customer_reviews.title: Sinus Pain Continues
customer_reviews.text: I have sinusitis regularly and thought this might bring relief to my sinus pain. It heats up your forehead pretty good but that's about it. It does not conform well enough to the sides of your nose and under your eyes to give the relief I need. I am sad and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product.
customer_reviews.text: It quit working after two weeks. Also, the directions were, obviously, incorrect. This product deserves zero stars.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Denslow

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for Migraine sufferers .
customer_reviews.text: I have trigeminal neuralgia and some days the pain is excruciating behind my eye. I’m so thankful for this product. When the pain is bad I put it on for 30 minutes and I usually fall asleep. It turns off automatically
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL J VERRETT

customer_reviews.title: Great for bells palsy
customer_reviews.text: I have bells palsy. This is not only very relaxing, it really helps my affected eye look and feel soooo much better. Its a safe heat for eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Neena

customer_reviews.title: Great for Dry Eye Syndrome.
customer_reviews.text: If you have dry eye syndrome, this hearing pad is for you! It is very comfortable to the point that I fall asleep with it on. The temperature is perfect. It’s very portable as I plug it into one of our USB batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne Young

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Goid product. I just wish it had a longer cord to adjust to different positions when you're laying down.
customer_reviews.author: Marzeter Moore

customer_reviews.title: Headache relief
customer_reviews.text: So at first I thought that having this thing feathered to your face was not gonna be good (it’s wired) but I found that it makes it even better because it keeps you from moving around to much. It helps a lot with headaches i enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is great. Can’t stay awake more than 20 minutes. So warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Mark DeVoe

customer_reviews.title: Five stars for five amps!
customer_reviews.text: Mask seems to help blephartitis. Extra hot temperature on this model was a critical necessity. But other’s eyes may be different? To get best heating, be sure to use a 5 amp usb power adapter, and not the 1 amp.
customer_reviews.author: t

customer_reviews.title: Nice for dry eyes
customer_reviews.text: Use it with drops for dry eye. Has heat settings and timer. I like it
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Pure bliss...
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate! This is the best you can get. I have dry eye and was buying the masks that can only be used once. This mask is always ready, super soft and makes you feel better. You will wonder what you did without it.
customer_reviews.author: Zoro

customer_reviews.title: I am directed to lie down for 20 minutes a ...
customer_reviews.text: I am directed to lie down for 20 minutes a day with warm compresses on my eyes. This maintains the heat for me, and helps the therapy along.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Marcus

customer_reviews.title: I live this thing!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have blepharitis. You can put the heat on and it shuts off with a timer. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Leeanne

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: The heat gradually got hotter...Too hot. Took to my Dr. He said don't use it. I emailed the company who were very nice. I returned it. Waiting for refund within the week.
customer_reviews.author: creynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good for relaxation and soothing
customer_reviews.text: I just use this for relaxation. I did have to made a Velcro extension of about 4 inches to make it fit my head. The controls seem to work fine. I'm not sure why the title includes the word "steam". Perhaps someone knows how to add some moisture.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lapin

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: I use this to ease my migraine pains and I really love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soothing for dry eyes.
customer_reviews.text: I love how soothing the eye mask is on my dry eyes. Very helpfuI seller I had issue with my first mask and contacted the seller and they quickly resolved it.
customer_reviews.author: Sb

customer_reviews.title: Worked well to stimulate tears but has to be pushed down.
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely but needs deeper NOSE NOTCH as it rides on the forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Top Down Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Soothing <3
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a couple months now and I absolutely love it. Perfect after a long day staring at bright screens. Just don’t make the same mistake I did— take out your contacts unless you want plastic welded to your eyes!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from constant headaches and head cold and this has been very helpful in reducing the pain. So it's not just for the sinuses and eyes, it works for your head as well. So we love that it's a multi-purpose product. Definitely worth getting.
customer_reviews.author: Chavonne

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: As a person who gets headaches a lot I absolutely love this product! It’s very soft and gives you the perfect amount of heat. I recommend this for people that also get headaches or want to relax because it made me fall asleep Atleast 10 minutes later
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great for sinus headaches!
customer_reviews.text: I have sinus headaches regularly. This heated mask helps relieve my pain. I love the 5 heat settings and the time increments. It’s been a blessing!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S. Veneracion

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work for long
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product a year ago and it stopped working. Also the cord cracked. So I bought it again in July because I really liked it. It stopped working after 1 month. I am now going to look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Laurene M. Pugliese

customer_reviews.title: I would not repurchase
customer_reviews.text: So sorry seller. This doesn't get hot enough. It was a waste of money for me.
customer_reviews.author: Rachele Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: I love this item.It is still working up to this date!
customer_reviews.author: BABA

customer_reviews.title: Broken after 4 uses
customer_reviews.text: Like everything about it but it doesn’t work. I purchased in Feb 2019 only woe it about 4 times and now it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Patrice

customer_reviews.title: barely last 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Initially my wife liked it, but as time went on the "run-time" got shorter and shorter. Barely stay warm for 7 minutes. Will look for a better brand.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Product is comfortable and heats up quickly
customer_reviews.text: Product is comfortable and heats up quickly. The cord is long enough to be able to get comfortable and it is a relaxing experience.
customer_reviews.author: Juiced99ws6

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy this product . It heats up quickly & does exactly what it is designed to do. I use it for my maxillary sinus headaches . its calming & the fact you can fall asleep wearing it without fear of burning your face is excellent
customer_reviews.author: Kristen & Steve

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Husband gets frequent styes in his eyes and this helps soothe the pain that comes along with them. Don’t need the whole heating pad!
customer_reviews.author: Epseyes

customer_reviews.title: DOA ON ARRIVAL - A COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS DOA it never worked no matter how many times I charged it a COMPLETE WASTE OF MONEY for me.

customer_reviews.title: Not warm enough
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t heat up enough to work. Had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Cool Paw Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect heated eye mask.
customer_reviews.text: This mask is very soft and did not get uncomfortable even after having it on throughout the night. The heat settings are set just right, the timer allows you to fall asleep with the heat on without heating all night, and this product is priced accurately.
customer_reviews.author: Keenan Siminski

customer_reviews.title: Great with the dual charging!
customer_reviews.text: Helps with sinus headache ‘s . Very soft and comfortable across the eyes. The price was very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: Relief from stress
customer_reviews.text: After wearing these for only a few minutes my eyes feel less dry and strained. It has also got rid of tired stress headaches. It was almost like taking a quick nap.
customer_reviews.author: Amber I

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband's birthday. He has problems with migraines snd this has helped so much!! Might have to get another one for me lol!
customer_reviews.author: Amber H.

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: Sooo comfy! When I have a headache or just want the heat of a face mask this works like a charm! Bought my sister one for Christmas!

customer_reviews.title: It really is helpful for dry eyes!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much, I bought another for my parents, who are also having success with dry eye treatment.

customer_reviews.title: Fits very well and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: This heats up very nicely and has choices for how long I want it to run. It's very comfortable and helps me to fall asleep quickly.
customer_reviews.author: L. Johnson

customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely and warms up quick. It's got a timer function which is great because I usually fall asleep with it on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Frantz

customer_reviews.title: Great mask - heats quickly!
customer_reviews.text: Husband and I use this mask every night... helps out dry eye AND helps us fall asleep. And the timer is very useful.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: Worked one time then it stopped. Item is a POS. Definitely returning!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer.Lucas1805

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: This mask works great out of the box. I like how simple it is to set up and it seems to be well made. Wife gets more use out of it than I do, and shes happy so I am too. Note: must be plugged in to power to function, no battery operation.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Romero

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: Mask is amazing when it works! My mask stopped working after two months of use however. Emailed the company but no response.
customer_reviews.author: Humberto J.

customer_reviews.title: Very handy

customer_reviews.text: I use PC long time for business and private. After use it, this heater makes my eye to refresh.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast heat up
customer_reviews.text: It's so warm, I love this for puffiness and tired eyes.

customer_reviews.title: Can’t sleep without it anymore
customer_reviews.text: I can’t even sleep without this anymore, I absolutely love this product. One of my best purchases. Only con is that the cord comes out quite easily, that would be the only thing!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Serro

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sinuses
customer_reviews.text: Really awesome product! It soothes my sinuses and relaxes me after a long day. Highly recommend for those who look at computer screens all day.
customer_reviews.author: Gena Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vendor customer services
customer_reviews.text: I received one but its temperature was too low. I noticed the vendor with the problem description and they politely replaced promptly. This vendor is responsible. The product is soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Felix Lin

product_meta.title: ARRIS Electric USB Heated Eye Mask with 5 Temperature Control Warm Therapeutic Treatment for Relieving Insomnia, Dry Eye, Blepharitis, Meibomian Gland Disease Brown …
feature_bullets: 【Broader Coverage Design】- Most eye mask in the market could just cover the eyes, while what we sell has broader coverage area, which could not only offer an eye treatment, but also keep your head warm. can use it even for a short break, at bedtime, longtime traveling etc.

【Easy and Convenient to Use】- This eye heating pad can be used anytime anywhere you like. Just simply plug it to a PC, power bank or USB adapter, it could work. You can use it for a short break, at bedtime, longtime traveling to relieve eye stress, headache, puffy eyes, insomnia, dry eyes, perfect as birthday gifts, thanksgiving gifts and christmas gift.

【How Does It Work】- Inspired by disposable hot steam eye mask, heated with graphene carbon fiber heater, which can produce 6-14 μm far infrared after heating from the human body and so as to effectively relieve dry eyes and eliminate dark circles, puffy eyes and improves the blood circulation around your eyes. 30 minutes per day recommended, gives you a relaxing eye therapy.

【5-Level Temperature Control & Time Setting】- The ARRIS heated eye mask has 5 classes heat temperature from 40°C - 60°C (104℉ to 140℉) and 6 classes timing from 10 - 60 minutes. Eyes are sensitive and can't stand high temperature for a long time. The recommended temperature is 45°C (113℉) for 30 minutes.

【Safety】- Built-in thermal protection module. Once it is overheat, it would stop until the heat return to the standard temperature. And It will stop working automatically when you go into deep sleep. Compared to microwaveable heated devices that can easily be overheated, our dry eye compress keeps a safe consistent range of heat. Also we offer 30 days free return guarantee for every customer.
